content.title: Matching you to your fullest potential. Land your dream job, fast!
content.description: You’re more than your resume. Create a free profile and let companies apply to interview you.

content.description1: Sit back, relax. Let us help you find the best match between companies and talents.
content.description2: 100% free for talents. For employers, pay us a tiny fee only when you get a match. Pay nothing if you don’t get what you’re looking for.
content.description3: We specialise in only talents in tech. Trust us on all things tech-related. From Web, Mobile, Web3, UIUX and everything in between.

content.title: Find your dream job, wherever you may be. 100% free.
content.description: Flexibility is the key to happiness. Whether you’re remote, hybrid, or fully in-office, Talentloop will connect you directly with hiring managers at the best companies that meet your needs best.

content.title: Hire better tech talent, faster.
content.description: Looking to hire? The candidates on Talentloop are qualified and ready to interview. We’ll make sure to match the right talents to you based on your requirements and cultural fit!

content.title: Here’s how it works
content.card1_description: Tell us your skills, your background and what you’re looking for. We check for matching companies.
content.card2_description: Search and apply for the jobs that you are interested in, or get interview request from companies.
content.card3_description: Check interview requests online. Agree to the companies that best match your career goals.
content.card4_description: We will work closely with you to select the right candidate throughout your interview process. Finally, we will mediate the offer negotiation process to ensure a win-win situation.
content.card5_description: Accept the job offer that you love the most!

content.title: See what job opportunities we have
Let’s get started! Are you a:
Innovative companies are only as successful as their people
content.description: Get instant access to a curated pool of responsive & competent tech talent actively seeking their next role

content.title: We’re more than ordinary headhunters
content.card1_title: We partner with top coding schools & universities
content.card3_title: Pay nothing if you don’t get a match
content.card1_description: Where Junior Software Engineers take their first steps in their tech career.
content.card2_description: Our team of consultants specialize in all things tech.
content.card3_description: Our success is your success. Pay when the work is done.
content.card4_description: We believe in long term relationships with both our employers and talents.
content.card5_description: We continuously engage Software Engineers so that you receive profiles quicker.
content.card6_description: In today’s ultra competitive hiring environment for software engineers, let us manage your candidates to ensure they stay.

content.card1_title: Hire for proven skills, not just pedigree
content.card3_title: Send customized assessments to candidates for free
content.card1_description: Traditional resumes look backwards at a candidate's experience. On Hired, get real-world skill assessments upfront so you can have the insights you need to find a better fit, faster.
content.card2_description: See candidates salary expectations and work preferences upfront to have more transparent negotiations that save time and avoid bias.
content.card3_description: Assess candidates' skills remotely with a free suite of customizable technical assessments. Run programming challenges in real-time or asynchronously, always with a complete coding playback.

content.title: Here’s how it works
content.card1_description: Every engagement begins with a discovery and qualifying your vacancies. Put simply, this is a structured review of your requirements.
content.card2_description: During the sourcing phase, the team will study your requirements and build a long list of candidates who are right for your requirements.
content.card3_description: The team will then screen through the candidates to ensure a preliminary fit using a combination of interview techniques. The outcome of this will be a shortlist of candidates for you to interview.
content.card4_description: We will work closely with you to select the right candidate throughout your interview process. Finally, we will mediate the offer negotiation process to ensure a win-win situation.
content.card5_description: Our work does not stop when the candidate accepts the offer. We will diligently keep in touch with the candidate during the pre-onboarding and post placement period to ensure the candidate settles in.

content.title: Start the next chapter in your career here.
content.card1_description: Sit back and let companies send you interview requests.
content.card2_description: Compare exclusive interview requests with salary details upfront.
content.card3_description: 100% free and confidential. Choose which interview to accept, completely risk-free.
content.card4_description: Create a job search profile focused on your skills rather than experience to land your dream job.

content.title: Build something you’re proud of.
content.description: If you're a developer, product manager, or designer, our employers want to meet you.
